title: [Missing] Remove links on documents/folders from Quick Access in File Explorer area programmatically
body:
After my application open office document programmatically in background, link to it appears in Quick Access Area in File Explorer. It's not good thing, because it's not needed to share this with users.
In this case, we need functionality to remove item from that area programmatically.

comments.body: I try the same few month in the past and also stuck in this area, will be cool to get some solution.

Sorry about maybe stupid/not correct question, but...Is Quick Access Area in File Explorer directly involved with "Recent Items" in Outlook 2016? Because after my add-in open MS Word document for example, link to it appears in Quick Access Area in File Explorer, plus in recent items in Outlook 2016. Seems, there we have methods to work with RecentFiles in Word/Excel, but there is no anything in Outlook.
